alert.note: Alert for Nodaway; Worth (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 17 at 4:28PM CDT until May 17 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR WESTERN WORTH AND NORTHEASTERN NODAWAY COUNTIES... At 428 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hopkins, or 9 miles southwest of Bedford, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hopkins, Sheridan, Parnell and Pickering. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
